abstracts.cdata!:
The main purpose of the Second Technical
            Assistance Project is to provide technical and managerial
            expertise to key economic agencies of Government to support
            the structural adjustment process. The aim is to achieve
            this objective through building on and improving the
            institutional framework in Government for macro-economic
            decision making. In particular, the project will: (a)
            strengthen the analytical and planning capabilities of the
            key economic ministries and agencies; (b) strengthen
            macro-economic management capabilities through more
            effective mechanisms for setting priorities, allocating
            resources and managing the government's policies; (c)
            upgrade personnel skills through on and off-the-job
            training; and (d) attract and retain senior management and
            technical civil servants by providing financial assistance
            for staff housing.
